title: Cognitive Characteristics of Older Adults and e-Learning Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Cognitive Psychology and Educational Technology Concepts
context.additional_context: Learning e-learning design strategies applicable to language education courses for training medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three characteristics of cognitive decline in older adults.
Learners can apply five core elements required for designing step-by-step modular learning.
Learners can structure evaluation criteria for cognitively friendly e-learning content in three or more levels.
Learners can develop two or more effective formative assessment tools in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
